member.name: T:DotVVM.Framework.Security.DefaultCsrfProtector
member.summary:
Implements synchronizer token pattern for CSRF protection.
The token is generated based on Session ID (random 256-bit value persisted in cookie), Request identity (full URI) and User identity (user name, if authenticated).
Value of stored Session ID and the token itself is encrypted and signed.

member.param: Context for current request.
member.returns: Base64-encoded string, which is supposed to be passed intact on postback.

member.summary: Validates supplied CSRF token. Throws when token is missing or invalid.
member.param: Context for current request.
